name: Zork-
body:
##Background
You are condemned in a high security prison and you must escape from it. The main
character is a man of 30Â­40 years old. The character has to discover the best way to
escape the prison without alert the guards. He can get different items which can help
to do it.

##Original Zork
[Zork](http://iplayif.com/?story=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ifarchive.org%2Fif-archive%2Fgames%2Fzcode%2Fzdungeon.z5)
